resources.string: Is the Discover Mobile App as secure as Discover.com?

The Discover Mobile App uses the same security standards as Discover.com. We ensure a high security level by never showing your account number, timing out each session after a period of inactivity, and by using your existing User ID and Password, which only you know.
What do I need to log into the Discover Mobile App?
To log in, you can use the same user ID and password that you have set up at Discover.com. If you do not have a user ID and password, tap on “Register Now” on the login screen.
